Name: Fury Knight
About the game: This game is a fantasy platformer presenting adventures of a little knight committed to get bad creatures out of the magic world with the help of a sword and magic. By upgrading himself he must get through all worlds and face his main enemy. Fury Knight is a hardcore 2D platformer with slasher elements. The task is to kill monsters at each level and collect the gold you can spend on upgrades at the end of each level. The upgrades range from HP increase to new weapons acquire. Game features: Shop Boss Pixel Art Complexity 30 levels.
